resource.chars:
Table of Thermometer - Correction to Log Rate from 40.0 to 98.0 no transcribed


By the application of the numbers from these two tables,
together with those for the Arc and Barometer, in the same
manner as in the Harton Experiments, there is obtained
the Corrected Log Rate of Pendulum upon Clock reformed
to Barometer 0.000 and Thermometer 50<sup>o</sup>, but affected
by the full amount of the errors of the table for
corrections depending on the Thermometer.
